title: What becomes of all the cans, plastics, newspapers and magazines I so religiously collect and put out on the curb every Monday morning in front of our Oak Island home? My husband says everything goes into a single bin on the Waste Management truck and just gets dumped in the landfill. He\'s right about almost everything, especially if I think it\'s too sad or horrible to be true. Is he right about the recyclables, too?
